title: Spaghetti Skillet Dinner
directions: In a skillet over medium heat, brown the ground beef with onions until no pink shows on the beef; drain.  Mix in green pepper and mushrooms and cook for a few minutes.  Add tomatoes with juice, spaghetti and water; stir.  Add Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.  Cook about 15 minutes or until spaghetti is tender, stirring occasionally.  Add cheese and stir until melted
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green bell peppers
1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, with liquid
